Text:
Oh Cirrus698 you are a hero!

Btw, the episode 3x03 was posted the other day but I can no longer see it. I can try reposting the torrent.
In fact I found it. It is posted 210306, but cannot be searched for. Just go through the TV-show-section and you will find it.

Thank you so much! I've been looking for this one, but didn't know where to look. I was searching for:

National Geographic - Air Emergency - Suicide Attack

This is the same story that was shown on National Geographic chanel, just a different title!!
